definition: major policy of the national government
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: The China Association for Promoting Democracy offered efforts to the country's general policy formulation and implementation.
sentences.chinese: 民進爲國家大政方針的制定和實施獻計出力。

sentences.english: The different ethnicity would not cause grand policy to be supremely different.
sentences.chinese: 民族不同並不會在大政方針上造成太大不同。

sentences.english: Leadership team is responsible for discussing national continuing education guidelines.
sentences.chinese: 指導小組擔任商榷全國持續教育的大政方針。
